capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm so glad to see Professor McGonagall around here. She's an amazing educator and a true leader at Hogwarts. I've always had a lot of respect for her dedication to the school and its students.
capsules_submitted.reply: let me ask you something. what is the university that professor mcgonagall is affiliated with?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was just talking to someone about Professor McGonagall and I can confirm that she is indeed affiliated with Hogwarts. She's an amazing teacher and a great role model for the students there.
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. what is the attribute that mcgonagall possesses?

capsules_submitted.utterance: I think McGonagall's glasses are really cool. I mean, who wouldn't want to wear a pair of magical square-lenses that can see through all sorts of spells and potions? It's just so... practical for a witch like her.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been doing some research on Dudley and it turns out that his lineage is quite interesting.
